# scam.hair — Hair Products & Services Scam Database

> Community-powered database of hair products & services scams. Search, vote, report, and protect yourself. Exposing fraud in the hair products & services industry.


scam.hair is a community-driven scam exposure platform focused on the hair products & services industry. Features a searchable database of known scams with risk levels, community voting, reporting tools, and educational resources. Users can search scams, vote on severity, share warnings on social media, and report new scams.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Hair Products & Services scam database and community reports](https://scam.hair)


## Keywords

hair products & services scams, scam database, fraud alert, scam warning, scam.hair
